```{r}
install.packages("VIM")
```
```{r}
install.packages("mice")
```


```{r}
# Load libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(VIM)
library(mice)

# Read in the data
grades <- read.csv("class-grades.csv")
```

```{r}
colSums(is.na(grades))

```

```{r}
aggr(grades, numbers = TRUE, sortVars = TRUE, cex.axis = 0.7)

```
```{r}
matrixplot(grades)

```

```{r}
grades_row_deleted <- grades %>%
  drop_na()
nrow(grades_row_deleted)

```
```{r}
grades_col_deleted <- grades %>%
  select(where(~ !any(is.na(.))))
ncol(grades_col_deleted)

```

```{r}
set.seed(123)

imputed_data <- mice(grades, m = 5, method = "pmm")
```
```{r}
completed_grades <- complete(imputed_data)

```

```{r}
mean(completed_grades$Final)

```
